announcements.title: Everdew
body: - Added the highly requested save and load system
- Options can now be adjusted directly from the main menu
- Slightly refined overall UI colors for better readability and style
- Removed tooltips due to a UI-related issue (will be revisited in a future update)
If there are any bugs please write them down in the comments :)

announcements.title: Launcher
body: - Added fuzzy search support. You can now search by developer name to find matching games in both the Store and Library
- The notification behaviour was slightly inaccurate. Notifications should now send correctly

announcements.title: Cubo
body: - Implemented a main menu and pause menu

announcements.title: Slime Impact 2D!
body: - Scientist buffs (damage speed, movement speed increase)
- Fixed black screen bug after teleporting to Nod-Krai
- Hardcore Mode and Insane Mode badges
- Ifa now follows the player if too far
- Fixed Anemo ability not being granted from Red Riot
- Changed prefab size of Ghost Bomb
- Slime King, Scientist and Lucifer now heal on player death
